Ingredients.1: 1.0 pounds frozen skinless, boneless chicken breasts

Ingredients.2: 1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes, well drained

Ingredients.13: 1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste

Ingredients.15: 1  red bell pepper, sliced into strips

Ingredients.16: 1  yellow bell pepper, sliced into strips

Ingredients.17: 1  green bell pepper, sliced into strips

Ingredients.20: 1 (8 ounce) package shredded Cheddar Jack cheese

Ingredients.21: 0.5 cup sour cream, or to taste

Directions.1: Combine chicken breasts, tomatoes, salsa, chili powder, salt, paprika, sugar, onion powder, garlic powder, bouillon granules, cumin, cayenne pepper, and red pepper flakes in a slow cooker.

Directions.2: Cover and cook on Low until chicken is tender, about 5 hours. Transfer chicken to a cutting board; shred using 2 forks. Return to the slow cooker. Add onions, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, green bell pepper, and cornstarch.

Directions.3: Cook on Low until peppers soften, 1 1/2 to 2 hours. Serve chicken and peppers with tortillas, Cheddar Jack cheese, and sour cream.
